title: England 40-8 Scotland: Women’s Rugby World Cup 2025 quarter-final – as it happened
summary: England dominated their match by scoring six tries against a determined but overmatched team. This victory secures their place in the semi-finals. They will face France in the next round.

title: Brendon McCullum mulls appointing Harry Brook as England vice-captain for Ashes
summary: Harry Brook is in contention to replace Ollie Pope as England's vice-captain for the upcoming Ashes series. Coach Brendon McCullum stated that the vice-captaincy position is open for discussion. The decision will be made ahead of the matches.

title: Manchester City 3-0 Manchester United: Premier League – as it happened
summary: Erling Haaland showcased his scoring prowess by netting two goals in a dominant performance. Manchester City delivered a convincing victory over their struggling local rivals. The match highlighted City's superiority in the derby.

title: Everton Women begin new era at Goodison Park with loss to Tottenham
summary: Everton Women suffered a 2-0 loss to Tottenham in their opening Women's Super League match at Goodison Park, now their permanent home. The defeat marked a challenging start to the season for the team. Fans hoped for a strong performance in their new venue but were left disappointed.

title: Haaland doubles up as City sweep United aside in Manchester derby
summary: Erling Haaland scored two goals as Manchester City secured a convincing 3-0 victory over Manchester United in the derby at the Etihad Stadium. The win showcased City's dominance in the match. Haaland's performance further solidifies his status as a key player for the team.
